title: IIT Roorkee Notification 2026 - Apply Online for Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: The Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee (IIT Roorkee) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Junior Research Fellow Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech in Electrical, Electronics Engineering can apply for the IIT Roorkee Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have me...
